locationAndLanguageTitle: Hello {{expertFullName}}! Let’s get to know you.
locationAndLanguageFormLabel-1: What country do you live in?
locationAndLanguageFormLabel-2: In which languages are you fluent in?
areasOfExpertiseTitle: Great! Tell us what your superpowers are.
areasOfExpertiseFormLabel: List all of your areas of expertise:
rateAndDurationTitle: Perfect! Let’s set up your rate and duration.
rateAndDurationFormLabel-1-Subtitle: Please, set your hourly rate here. Below, you will be able to define the session times you are willing to offer (in 15 minute increments). Your rate for each session increment you choose to offer will be automatically calculated based off of your hourly rate.
rateAndDurationFormLabel-2-Subtitle: Define how long your session will be, minimum of 30 minutes.
scheduleTitle: Love it! Let’s set up your availability.
scheduleFromLabel: Apply these times to all days
profileInformationTitle: Almost done! Add some basic information to your expert profile.
profileInformationSubtitle: Help people find you by uploading an image and an intro video.
profileInformationFormLabel-3-Subtitle: You can always edit at a later time
completeWizardSubtitle: While we process and verify your expert status, feel free to set up your schedule, pricing or explore the community.
expertVerificationTitleBottom: We are verifying your expert status
